EmailTemplate.name: CUS - GTM-1291: CP1 Deprecation.CUS: Control Panel Changes (GTM-1291/1321)
EmailTemplate.subject: Improvements to your control panel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’ll be making improvements to your control panel starting the week of September 15.
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’ve made improvements to the BigCommerce control panel that you’ll see in the next few weeks. Here are the key changes:
- The navigation is now on the left-hand side and stays with you as you go down the page, making it accessible without having to scroll back up. - The sub navigation is visible in each subsection, reducing the number of clicks when working on daily tasks. - We’ve added new product features like Channel Manager, which lets you seamlessly integrate your store with Facebook and Pinterest (Amazon and eBay coming soon). - You now have the option to change how quickly you’re logged out due to inactivity: choose from 15 minutes up to 2 hours.
The changes will start to appear the week of September 15th. You won’t have to do anything to upgrade — we’ll send you a message in your control panel when the update is complete.
Best,
Derrek Pearson
Senior Product Manager
bigcommerce.com <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com]]>
